summary: The 2016 Formula One season was the 70th year of top-level racing. It had 21 races, the most at that time, starting in Australia and ending in Abu Dhabi. Nico Rosberg won the Drivers' Championship, beating his teammate Lewis Hamilton by five points. This ended Hamilton's two-year winning streak. Rosberg then retired. Mercedes won the Constructors' Championship again, with 297 points more than Red Bull. This season also saw the return of the German and European Grands Prix, and a new team, Haas F1.
title: 2016 Formula One World Championship
